name: Dayton Aviation Services, LLC
about: Dayton Aviation Services, LLC is a premier flying school located at the closest airport to Downtown Dayton. We offer customized Part 61 flight training programs tailored to your needs and schedule, ensuring instruction that fits your learning style. With a fleet of eight airplanes, including Light Sport two-seaters and Cessna 172s, we cater to a variety of flying interests. Our instructors are passionate about teaching and committed to providing a fun and family-oriented flying environment. We also offer aircraft rentals with no monthly dues, making flying accessible and hassle-free. Our facility features a 3500x65 paved runway and a parallel grass strip, rich in aviation history as the site where the Wright Brothers learned to fly. At Dayton Aviation Services, we prioritize your flying experience and ensure you receive top-quality instruction.
